title: Company Apps Enrollment API
body: Having users enroll their phone using the same mdm client no matter the  vendor is a nice idea.  However, if an IT tech is using the same mdm vendor across all platforms, the enrollment experience is then totally different.  We would like to make the enrollment process consistent for our users.

comments.body:
Have you tried RegisterDeviceWithManagement?
https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn574820(v=vs.85).aspx
